message: aint no way they did this to my boy haida with that ending.. he was my netflix pfp and everything there better be a new season soon
this series is incredible, its kinda sad that people don't watch this show, this series deserves more!.

This show is just too brilliant. Never is there a show where it keep me guessing to the end. I think the ending is fitting. Haida really did something wrong. In Japan it's culturally encouraged to step down/resigned as a self punishment. Haida is rich. He never really needs to work. For me all this time he was looking for love in this office and ultimately he find what he was looking for.

i hated the ending. the way they portrayed haida is just bad, he literally became a huge ass looser and the only thing that changed from the start of the season is that haida doesnt work there anymore
HAHAHA my dog was barking at his sound 00;40
